TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlSubject extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表 SAML 安全性權杖的主體。

span.span: Represents the subject of a SAML security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷提示可指定安全性權杖的主體。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify the subject of the security token. SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 會判斷提示屬於 安全性權杖主體 (subject) 的主體 (principal)。A asserts the principal that is the subject of the security token. 這個主體是使用 類別加以指定。This principal is specified using a class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然用來指定名稱的格式具有擴充性，但是下表列出的是已定義在 SAML 規格中的格式。Although the format used to specify a name is extensible, the following table lists the formats defined by the SAML specification. |格式Format|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||URI，表示已用電子郵件地址方式指定了 SAML 判斷提示的主體。A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an email address.| ||URI，表示會以 Windows 網域帳戶方式來指定 SAML 判斷提示的主體。A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.|

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、名稱所在的網域、名稱所使用的格式、驗證通訊協定、其他驗證資訊以及金鑰識別碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified name, the domain in which the name resides, the format the name is in, authentication protocols, additional authentication information, and a key identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來指定 `name` 參數名稱的格式具有擴充性；下表列出的是已定義在 SAML 規格中的格式。The format used to specify a name for the `name` parameter is extensible; the following table lists the formats defined by the SAML specification. |格式Format|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||URI，表示已用電子郵件地址方式指定了 SAML 判斷提示的主體。A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified as an email address.| ||URI，表示會以 Windows 網域帳戶方式來指定 SAML 判斷提示的主體。A URI that states the subject of a SAML assertion is specified using a Windows domain account.| 用來指定 `confirmations` 參數的驗證通訊協定集合具有擴充性，但下表列出的是已定義在 SAML 規格中的通訊協定。The set of authentication protocols to specify for the `confirmations` parameter is extensible; however the following table lists the protocols defined by the SAML specification. |通訊協定Protocol|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||URI，它會指定 安全性權杖的接收者應該要使用 屬性來確認 SOAP 訊息是否由 SAML 判斷提示的主體所傳送。A URI that specifies that the recipient of a security token should use the property to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.| ||URI，它會指定 SAML 安全性權杖的收件者無法取得其他資訊來確認 SOAP 訊息是否由 SAML 判斷提示的主體所傳送。A URI that specifies that additional information is not available for a recipient of a SAML security token to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然驗證通訊協定集合具有擴充性，但下表列出的是已定義在 SAML 規格中的通訊協定。Although the set of authentication protocols s extensible, the following table lists the protocols defined by the SAML specification. |通訊協定Protocol|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||URI，它會指定 安全性權杖的接收者應該要使用 屬性來確認 SOAP 訊息是否由 SAML 判斷提示的主體所傳送。A URI that specifies that the recipient of a security token should use the property to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.| ||URI，它會指定 SAML 安全性權杖的收件者無法取得其他資訊來確認 SOAP 訊息是否由 SAML 判斷提示的主體所傳送。A URI that specifies that additional information is not available for a recipient of a SAML security token to confirm that the SOAP message was sent by the SAML assertion's subject.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考可針對特定驗證通訊協定自訂的可擴充資料片段。The property refers to an extensible piece of data that can be customized for a specific authentication protocol. 屬性會對應到已在 Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) 規格中定義之 `` 項目。The property corresponds to the `` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
